subject: Verify all tests pass end-to-end
description:
Run the full test suite for the dummy module and verify:

1. All unit tests in `index.test.js` pass
2. All utility tests in `utils.test.js` pass
3. All integration tests in `integration.test.js` pass
4. No warnings or errors in test output
doneWhen: Full test suite runs green with zero failures.
